mixed-citation.article-title: Two new species of Sonerila Roxb. (Melastomataceae) from Laos

tp:treatment-sec.p: 1. Acaulescent herb without evident erect stems above ground or with a very short rhizomatous stem; leaves forming a rosette .................................................................................................................... 6

2. Opposite leaves on stems isomorphic; lamina linear to elliptic-oblong, less than 3 cm long, acute, cuneate to attenuate at base ............................................................................................................... 3
